TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(CUSTOMER_ID=lkp_CUSTOMER_ID1 AND FIRST_NAME != lkp_FIRST_NAME1 OR MOBILE != lkp_MOBILE1 OR ADDRESS1 != lkp_ADDRESS11 OR ZIPCODE != lkp_ZIPCODE1 OR COUNTRY != lkp_COUNTRY1, true, false)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: update_date

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.CUSTOMER_KEY as CUSTOMER_KEY, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.FIRST_NAME as FIRST_NAME, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.MOBILE as MOBILE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.ADDRESS1 as ADDRESS1, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.ZIPCODE as ZIPCODE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.COUNTRY as COUNTRY, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.VERSION as VERSION, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER_ID FROM T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION where (T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.CUSTOMER_ID, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.VERSION) In (select T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.CUSTOMER_ID, MAX(T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.VERSION) from T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION group by T_CUSTOMER_SCD_VERSION.CUSTOMER_ID)

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
